item.title: RPI Libraries Join PALCI Consortium
item.description: The Rensselaer Libraries are pleased to announce that they have recently joined the Partnership for Academic Library Collaboration and Innovation, or PALCI. With this membership, which replaces the Libraries’ previous ConnectNY services, Rensselaer students, faculty, and researchers will gain access to and benefit from PALCI’s extensive resource-sharing network, which includes academic and research libraries and a vast collection of over 46 million items shared by member institutions.
item.author: Community

item.title: Rensselaer at Work to Continue Graduate Certificate Review Sessions July 16
item.description: Date: Tuesday, July 16, 2024 7:00 PM - 7:30 PM - Join Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph.D., for this information session highlighting the whole range of Rensselaer’s online, project-based graduate certificate programs. Three courses in length and able to be completed in as little as seven months, the certificates can add up to a customized, career-aligned master’s degree. Please register if you plan to attend.

item.title: Women’s Lacrosse Announces Prospect Clinic
item.description: The Rensselaer women’s lacrosse team, led by head coach Leslie DeLano, will be hosting a Summer Prospect Clinic on Sunday, July 28 from 9:15 a.m. to 3 p.m. at ECAV Stadium.

item.title: “Tackle Your Debt” Webinar to be Held July 17
item.description: Date: Wednesday, July 17, 2024 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM - The Off-Campus Commons, in partnership with Broadview Federal Credit Union, presents this webinar to discuss a basic budgeting framework, and help participants develop effective debt pay-down strategy, gain understanding for debt levels, and reflect on what is considered good debt and bad debt. Please register in advance!

item.title: Study Abroad Applications Now Being Accepted for Spring 2025
item.description: The Office of International Programs’ application portal is now open to undergraduate students who wish to apply for spring 2025 study abroad. Deadlines, contact info, and application guidelines are available via the International Programs website.
item.author: Students

item.title: Campus Summer Shuttle Service to Continue for City Station Residents
item.description: The Office of Parking and Transportation will be continuing shuttle service to Rensselaer students living at the City Station residences for the summer, with shuttle service to run from 10AM to 10PM Monday through Saturday, and from noon to 8PM on Sunday. The City Station shuttle bus stop is located in front of City Station East.

item.title: CCPD to Host “Using Handshake for Undergrad Research Postings” Faculty Training
item.description:
On Wednesday, July 17 from 1:00PM to 2:30PM in the CCPD conference room, the CCPD will host an interactive opportunity for faculty members to learn how to use Handshake for posting undergraduate research positions. Lunch will be provided. Space is limited, so interested faculty should submit a registration webform to sign up as soon as possible.
